name: Update Account
description: Updates existing patient account information when changes occur to demographics, insurance, or billing details
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 6 Financial Management - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Communicate changes to existing patient account information to ensure billing accuracy and data consistency across systems
timing: Sent when any account-related information changes, including demographics, insurance updates, or billing modifications
standardNotes: P05 should only be used for existing accounts - use P01 for new account creation
Used for any modification to account data after initial creation
EVN.2 should contain the update/modification date/time
Include only the segments and fields that have changed
Maintains account continuity while updating specific information
realWorldScenarios: Patient moves and provides new address for billing statements
Insurance policy change requires updated coverage information
Name change due to marriage requires account demographic update
Employer change necessitates new insurance and guarantor information
Billing address correction after returned mail notification
Contact information update when patient provides new phone number

generationRules.PID: Patient identification with updated demographic information
generationRules.PV1: Visit information if account changes relate to specific encounter
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - account accuracy is critical for billing and patient communication
